github.copilot.chat.testGeneration.instr.text: Use Jest and React Testing Library. Co-locate test files as *.test.ts or *.test.tsx next to the file under test.

github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: Flag any use of `any`, non-null assertions, inline styles, or atoms defined outside src/lib/atoms.ts.

github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use conventional commits format: type(scope): description. Types: feat, fix, chore, refactor, docs, style, test.
